allow: Bash(for file in TravelTypesStep.tsx StyleComfortStep.tsx TransportStep.tsx ActivitiesStep.tsx AccommodationStep.tsx)

Bash(do sed -i 's/text-blue-600/text-orange-500/g; s/text-blue-800/text-orange-800/g; s/text-blue-900/text-orange-900/g; s/text-blue-700/text-orange-700/g; s/bg-blue-50/bg-orange-50/g; s/bg-blue-100/bg-orange-100/g; s/bg-blue-600/bg-orange-500/g; s/border-blue-200/border-orange-200/g; s/border-blue-300/border-orange-300/g; s/border-blue-500/border-orange-500/g; s/hover:bg-blue-700/hover:opacity-90/g' "$file")
